Local Law 97 creates jobs in energy efficiency. Intro 772 would destroy those future jobs. 😬

It would also raise utility bills because energy efficiency ==> less energy waste ===> lower bills.🤦

It would also increase air pollution, causing asthma and heating the planet 😱 https://t.co/XixuGuiL3m

Community forum in SE Queens. We educated people about Local Law 97:

✅ good jobs
✅ lower utility bills
✅ less pollution

The real estate lobby hates the law. They want to gut it by passing Intro 772. Thankfully, @NYCCouncil @NYCSpeakerAdams hasn’t moved the bill 👏 https://t.co/YKl6bG8Jwc
